# THIS IS A GENERATED FILE.
#
# Source template:
# added_folders/templates/common/scripted_guis/GH_bestiary_scripted_gui.txt.jinja
#
# Please avoid manually editing this file: your changes WILL be overwritten when it gets regenerated.
# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

GH_bestiary_start_set_filter_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {	has_variable = bestiary_class_filter }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = bestiary_class_filter
				value = flag:beast_filter
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {	has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter }
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = bestiary_biozone_filter
				value = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
		}
	}
}

GH_bestiary_all_class_set_filter_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = bestiary_class_filter
			value = flag:any_class_filter
		}
	}
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
	}
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		NOT = {
			var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
		}
	}
}

		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:cyrat_biozone_filter
	}
}

GH_bestiary_hare_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_rabbit_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vyshtanka_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vyshtanka_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_brown_hare_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter

  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_marches_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:northern_opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:fools_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:brass_sea_coasts_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amaghea_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_clanlands_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_marches_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:northern_opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:fools_coast_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_clanlands_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_red_deer_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_deer_region_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_deer_region_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_reacher_red_deer_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_true_buffalo_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

GH_bestiary_bubalus_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:magiyor_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:katuppilan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:nattanan_highlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:magiyor_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:katuppilan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:nattanan_highlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_fennec_fox_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter

		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_boar_region_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_REPLACE_hunt_animal_boar_region_filter
  				}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter

  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_owlbear_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

GH_bestiary_lion_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:imperial_isle_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_western_aversaria_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:imperial_isle_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_western_aversaria_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

  				}

			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
  				}

GH_bestiary_hippopotamus_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_rhinoceros_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter

  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kemsar_biozone_filter
  				}

  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:cyrat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:katuppilan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rovarska_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:dahangon_lowlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:cyrat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:katuppilan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rovarska_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:krehejad_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_pirate_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:dahangon_lowlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:reptile_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:krehejad_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_pirate_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:dahangon_lowlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_equine_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_zebra_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:mammal_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter

		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:southern_kalath_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_western_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:southern_kalath_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_western_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

	}
}
GH_bestiary_eider_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_tufted_duck_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_scoter_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:pathos_delta_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_old_growth_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sulzegg_basin_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalath_redwoods_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:guillate_rocks_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lichdoms_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kasiryat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:darmirat_plain_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kashti_flats_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kafasali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vichacil_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter

  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
  				}
			}

GH_bestiary_kashiryan_spot-billed_duck_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_dahangon_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_ga_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_dahangon_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_pochard_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_red-crested_pochard_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aironoi_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_equatorial_sarradon_filter

				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_near_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_far_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_dahangon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_northern_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_equatorial_sarradon_filter

	}
}
GH_bestiary_horned_grebe_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:lonely_light_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_silver_grebe_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {

			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone

				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}

				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_flyway_great_arctic_chevalien_sea_filter

GH_bestiary_common_quail_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:imperial_isle_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:imperial_isle_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:damota_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aekershaan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:alghazir_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_grey_partridge_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:world_greater_aversaria_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_snow_partridge_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:north_kharadan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:hyratan_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:north_kharadan_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:hyratan_biozone_filter
  				}

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:knokidbes_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:imperial_isle_biozone_filter

		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_desert_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kharadamat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sinhamiyah_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:khenemhat_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:ayyar_coast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amsar_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:boneyard_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sirwali_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:mayikprolollan_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:bird_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:mayikprolollan_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_almas_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:humanoid_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amaghea_mountains_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:humanoid_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:amaghea_mountains_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:humanoid_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:humanoid_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:crater_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:rojihlat_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}

	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:insect_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_shattered_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_pirate_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_dahangon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_lonely_light_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_mayikprolollan_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_whisperveil_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:insect_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_shattered_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_sarradon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_kashirya_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_pirate_coast_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_dahangon_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_lonely_light_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_mayikprolollan_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:GH_geographic_whisperveil_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_ukhinbooum_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:insect_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:brass_sea_coasts_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:great_steppe_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:redlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:insect_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:brass_sea_coasts_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:great_steppe_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:aironoian_southeast_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:redlands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

  				}

GH_bestiary_meadow_spriggan_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:elemental_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:elemental_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_forest_spriggan_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:elemental_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:elemental_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:malcois_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:opakhasia_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_aironoi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:foglands_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:sarradonian_mountains_biozone_filter

  				}

		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aberration_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aberration_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_forest_troll_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aberration_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vyshtanka_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aberration_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:kalathipsomi_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:chevalie_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:konijkmener_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:etepezea_biozone_filter
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:vyshtanka_biozone_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:spirit_filter
  				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_isles_sea_region_filter
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:spirit_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
					var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:western_isles_sea_region_filter
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
GH_bestiary_torkyll_item_is_shown_scripted_gui = {
	scope = character
	is_shown = {
		has_variable = bestiary_class_filter
		has_variable = bestiary_biozone_filter
		OR = {
			AND = { # Specified class, and biozone
  				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aquatic_filter
  				OR = {
  				}
			}
			AND = { # Specified class, not biozone
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:aquatic_filter
				var:bestiary_biozone_filter = flag:any_biozone_filter
			}
			AND = { # Specified biozone, not class
				var:bestiary_class_filter = flag:any_class_filter
				OR = {
  				}
			}
			# NO ALL CLASS ALL BIOZONE BECAUSE IT CAUSES SLIGHT STUTTER
		}
	}
}
